entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reopen #11785: FlyoutPage.IsPresented=false throws InvalidOperationException: 'Can't change IsPresented when setting Default' (default or any other behavior that can have split type behavior) #20088
  • [Android] Benchmarks.Droid.ViewHandlerBenchmark.Entry allocated more memory #20086
  • Windows app installs on Wndows 10 but fails to install on Windows 11 as it keeps asking for .NET even after installation of .NET 8? #20084
  • Is "UseMauiCompatibility()" to port from Xamarin.iOS to MAUI fully functional? #20075
  • Appearing page event fired twice when performing PushAsync() inside of the Appearing event hander method #20071
  • [Android] Secondary ToolbarItem Icon Color not correct #20070
  • FlexLayout children inside a Grid overflow FlexLayout container #20064
  • CollectionView - SelectedItem visual state manager not working #20062
  • Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.After.targets" was not found error coming while building the .net MAUI windows targeted application. #20057
  • Font Attributes is not applied in editor on macOS and iOS #20054
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] TapGestureRecognizer not working with TableView #19348
    Backlog
  • Window not resizing from the Top #20061
    Backlog
  • MAUI .NET 6/7 Library not loaded: @rpath/liblua54.framework/Versions/A/liblua54 #20026
  • Add Support for KeyedServices #18992
    Backlog
  • Shell navigation bar flickering during refresh (animation transition) after the menu/flyout item selection #20035
  • Issue with Frame Layout Causing Child AbsoluteLayout Rendering Problems, replace Frame with Grid works #19880
  • [iOS] CollectionView multi-select pre-selected item VisualState error #13072
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView SelectedItem not working #13059
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView: Color for SelectedItem of CollectionView not set when SelectedItem is assigned in ViewModel #20030
  • MAUI - CollectionView Pre Select Item background color not change on windows #15666
  • Resizetizer doesn't allow having one-letter named images #19574
  • Deployment fails to arm64-v8a emulator #20053
  • [Nightly] Removed EnumerableExtensions break MAUI Xaml Hot Reload #20049
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #19894
  • Setting main page from modal async page does nothing on Android #14697
  • Using font files does not work #14871
    Backlog
  • Swipe Gesture within a carousel view not being Recognized in Android #15535

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    community ✨
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • Reset the xaml in the Sandbox MainPage.xaml #20082
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] Adjust recycle check in ItemContentControl #20079
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20077
  • [net8.0] Update versions for 8.0.200 #20074
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    community ✨
  • Add Obsolete tag for old IndexOf #20068
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest to 4.3.4 #20067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    community ✨
  • Optimize converters for GridLength, ColumnDefinition, and RowDefinition #20048
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20073
  • Make sure we support keyed services in client apps #20014
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Enforce preference of braces for code blocks (IDE0011) in .editorconfig #20056
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Default to no item selected #20072
  • [tests] Move integration tests to use MauiDotNetTfm #20060
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • Revert "Remove unused functions (#20029)" #20050

Updated

  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990
    area/Xaml </>
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Split the InputTransparency tests #19925
    area/testing
  • Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    community ✨
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟, stale
  • [Trimming] Allow creating TypedBinding from expressions #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
  • Enable building WASDK Self-Contained packaged apps #20019
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area/testing
  • Optimize TemplateUtilities #19982
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
